ModMetaData.name: Size patch for Warhammer: Gor
ModMetaData.author: Kompadt
ModMetaData.description:
Feel insecure about the size of your Massive axe? Don't feel like its true size is shown? Well worry no more! This patch brings out the Massive in massive!
This patch need JecsTools to work. It corrects the size of the Warhammer: Gor mods weapons.
Load this patch after: Warhammer:Gor
